```{python}
# 1. ERA5-Land からデータをダウンロード（Copernicus API）
client = cdsapi.Client()

dataset = "reanalysis-era5-land"
request = {
    "variable": ["total_precipitation"],
    "year": "2025",
    "month": "05",
    "day": [
        "01", "02", "03",
        "04", "05", "06",
        "07", "08", "09",
        "10", "11", "12",
        "13", "14", "15",

        "25", "26", "27",
        "28", "29", "30",
        "31"
    ],
    # "day": [f"{d:02d}" for d in range(1, 32)],
    "time": [f"{h:02d}:00" for h in range(24)],  # 00:00〜23:00
    # "time": ["09:00"],
    "data_format": "netcdf",
    "download_format": "unarchived",
    "area": [8.7, -13.4, 8, -12.9]
}

client.retrieve(dataset, request).download()
```

```{python}
# 2. 読み込みと日積算
ds = xr.open_dataset('8226147e949833b3460e6bfa18aabea1.nc')
prec = ds['tp'] * 1000  # m → mm
# すでに日毎データなのでresampleは不要
prec_daily = prec
```

```{python}
ds = xr.open_dataset('2025_04.nc')
tp = ds["tp"] * 1000.0  # m → mm

# bbox内を空間平均（lat, lon 次元名はデータによって 'latitude','longitude'）
tp_mean = tp.mean(dim=["latitude","longitude"])

# 日合計を計算（1時間値の合計）
tp_daily = tp_mean.resample(valid_time="1D").sum()
tp_daily
# 雨日フラグ（微小値を切り捨て）
rain_day = (tp_daily > 1)  # 1 mm/day 以上を「降雨あり」と判定
df
df = pd.DataFrame({
    "date": tp_daily["valid_time"].values,
    "rain_mm_day": tp_daily.values,
    "rain_flag": rain_day.values.astype(int)
})
df
print(df.head())
```



```{python}
# 3. イベント抽出
threshold = 30  # mm/day
rain = prec_daily.mean(dim=['latitude', 'longitude'])
df = rain.to_dataframe().reset_index().rename(columns={'tp': 'rain_mm'})
```



```{python}

# 連続降雨イベントIDを付与
df['event'] = (df['rain_mm'] > threshold).astype(int)
df['event_id'] = (df['event'].diff() == 1).cumsum()
df.loc[df['event'] == 0, 'event_id'] = np.nan
```
